items.value: You can be my friend if you help me and deliver Bob the Present...

Hey i am Sergio!
Would you help me deliver a present?
It is for Bob and he is in the first city! (Suburbs)

He will ask you for it, dont lose it...
I will not give you any more tasks if you fail with this!
i dont know Bob, how can i find him?
yes, i'll bring the Present to Bob!
i am busy, maybe later Sergio!

You can find him at the City you started at. (Suburbs)
If Bob is not your friend yet, you will need to do a few tasks for him!

Definitely keep the Bong safe and deliver it!
If you do not deliver it correctly, i will not give you any new tasks!

NOTE:
get sure you have at least 1 free Slot inside your Inventory!
ok, may i will do it for you!

You are a great Person!
Here is the Bong for Bob...

If you brought it over, he will give you something for me.
Bring me the Special Delivery of Bob and we're definitely friends!

You got: 1x Bong
